title: Nexo Launches Crypto Mastercard for EEA Citizens
description: The card supports transactions in Euro, U.S. dollar, and British pound, and stablecoins for over 100 million merchant terminals globally.

title: Binance Launches ‘Send Cash’ Remittance Services in Latam
description: Binance, the largest cryptocurrency exchange by volumes traded, has announced the launch of “Send Cash,” a Latam-focused remittance service. The newly launched tool will allow users in nine countries in the region to send crypto to bank accounts of friends or family in Argentina and Colombia directly, bypassing third-party intermediaries. Binance Seeks to Ease Remittances […]

title: Bitcoin Maintains Strength While Pepe Coin and KuCoin Face Correction
description: Bitcoin’s price rises, encountering resistance at $28,000, but later experiences a downward correction. Pepe’s short-term technical analysis indicates weakness, with recent analysis being more favorable than about 26% of other tokens. The cryptocurrency market has experienced a decline since yesterday. Despite Bitcoin maintaining a positive trend, several significant alternative cryptocurrencies are encountering negative market sentiment. [...]
